articles.title: "All I Heard Was, 'Thomas, Noooo'": Workers Are Sharing The Biggest Mistake They've Seen A Coworker Make, And I'm At A Loss For Some Of These
articles.description: "They took the wrong coffin to a funeral. Someone else had to drive to the cemetery with the correct deceased on board."
articles.content:
"She said something like, 'We're all good, let's go!' I knew how many were in each group, so without answering her, I did a quick count. 
Sure enough, we were missing one. I ended up leaving the bus… [+387 chars]
